'''Rime-Worn Crystals''' are limited items that only exist during the duration of the event "[[The Chalk Prince and the Dragon]]". It is dropped by [[Elite Enemies]] in [[Dragonspine]] such as [[Fatui Cicin Mages|Fatui Cryo Cicin Mages]] and [[Ruin Grader]]. It has no use, other than being a challenge objective to collect a certain amount of these fragments in the event.

{{See also|Rime-Worn Fragment}}
